skins.shipDescription: We meet at last! I'm Hololive's virtual fox, Shirakami Fubuki! Commander, now that you've called me, we're gonna have a foxin' good time! Now then, let's get to work!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the leader of Hololive Gamers, Shirakami Fubuki! In this world, I am destroyer Shirakami Fubuki!
skins.acquisition: We meet at last! I'm Hololive's virtual fox, Shirakami Fubuki! Commander, now that you've called me, we're gonna have a foxin' good time! Now then, let's get to work!
skins.login: Commander, welcome back! I've prepared some delicious tea for you! C'mon, let's set out together~?
skins.details: I'm a normal, wholesome, cute Vtuber~ I'm a bit shy but... Eh, you can't tell? Well, that's because I just like to talk to people~!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Hum~ hum~ Ack! Um, I wasn't slacking off!
skins.secretaryIdle2: The tea is really delicious today as well! Shall we enjoy some together? I can make the perfect cup of tea now!
skins.secretaryIdle3: The Fubuki-class Fubuki sure has a fluffy tail... I want to floof it!!
skins.secretaryIdle4: Heheh~ Commander, don't I look awesome in this outfit?
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, do you need my help with something?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander! My tail is really sensitive, so don't just go around touching it!
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Uwaah~ Ahaha, p-please have mercy~ My ears are really ticklish~

skins.shipDescription: Tada~! It's your favorite Shirakami Fubuki, Hololive Summer version! Commander, pleased to be your fox!
skins.acquisition: Tada~! It's your favorite Shirakami Fubuki, Hololive Summer version! Commander, pleased to be your fox!
skins.login: It's not a trip to the ocean without... swimsuits! The summery, slightly liberated version of Fubuki is here~!
skins.details: Since I went through all the effort of putting a swimsuit on, why don't we head down into the water? Woahh... that's not what I meant! I just wanted to help out a little with the exercises＃
skins.secretaryIdle1: *stare*... Commander, are you ogling me...? That's no good!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I see a lot of my friends in swimsuits as well. Looks like over here, you can play on the beach all year long.
skins.secretaryIdle3: It's a little embarrassing.. so please stop staring at me so much.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You're not allowed to touch right there either!
